question: you have decided to leave your currer job and look for a new one .Write a letter to a friend . In your letter explainWhy you want to leave your current jobdescribe what kind of job you are looking forask for some help or advice
text: Hi, hope you find this piece of paper  in the  best of your health and spirits. Writing this letter to seek  some advice on getting a new job as I am leaving my current organisation .

For the last couple of weeks, I was asking for an appraisal from my manager but he was not responding appropriately. Therefore, I decided to resign as I am not feeling comfortable working in that type of organization where seniors do not consider their teammate's aspirations. In addition to this, the work that was assigned to me is not according to my skill set . Since my profile is of a developer, it's a bit difficult to perform testing tasks.

Looking for a development profile job nearby Chardigash as it will be easy for commuting since my hometown is nearby Chandigarh. My preference is tasks related  to UI as I found the same very interesting. I need your assistance in finding appropriate companies. where I can do work according to my skills. It would be helpful if you provide any references.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Pay my regards to uncle and aunt.
